alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 8:17PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Broadwater and Meagher Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 814 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and isolated thunderstorms along a cold front extending from near Canyon Ferry Lake to Toston. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... White Sulphur Springs, Newlan Creek Reservoir, Fort Logan and Ringling. This includes the following highways... Highway 12 between mile markers 7 and 51. Highway 89 between mile markers 1 and 20, and between mile markers 39 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
